sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './../styles/tour-details.css' import {Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup} from'reactstrap' import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' const TourDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams() // This is a static data later we will call our API and load our data from // database const tour = tourData.find(tour => tour.id === id) // destructure properties from the tour object const { photo, title, description, price, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize } = tour return ( <>

{title}
) } export default TourDetails
